ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We wish to acknowledge and thank the local traditional healers of the region for patiently revealing their traditional ways of practice. We will like to also thank the NANTMP for their consent and assistance particularly, Mal. Ibrahim Dan Amadu for overseeing the whole process of the interviews and specimen collection. We would like to state here that this study was self-funded by the authors and received no additional funds from any external source.
